name: The Little Green Umbrella
description:
The Little Green Umbrella is a short narrative-centric, fairytale-like, platformer(?) made for the 2020 GMTK game jam. You play as Dave's umbrella, which has been blown away in a storm. You must ride the wind to make your way back to Dave.

I developed this game alone, and made all the art, music, and sound (excluding the royalty free rain, thunder, and wind sounds) for it during the jam.

Controls:

A - Tilt Left

D - Tilt Right

Mouse - Navigate Menus

Any Key - Progress text
